A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Really\, this was the first movie since Jaws 4 that I walked out of the theater feeling ripped off. Bad Star Wars\, and just a bad Sci-fi movie as well. Deconstructing the Star Wars mythos and the heroes journey is not what was expected\, and perhaps not what was wanted by many viewers and fans. I felt the humour was poor\, out of place and handled with sitcom levels of skill. Not worth a re-watch\, even for free on TV.
